params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.target_shape
params.description: The distribution shape to which the group converges either proactively or on resize events (depending on the value set in updatePolicy.instanceRedistributionType). Check the TargetShape enum for the list of possible values.

params.name: data.zones
params.description: Zones where the regional managed instance group will create and manage its instances.
